cloneStrategy.description: specify clone strategy, include empty, snapshot and sync, default empty(option)

copies.description: The number of copies of the newly created cluster data, consistent with the number of copies set in PD

dbUser.description: The username and password for the newly created database cluster, default is the root user, which is not valid for Data Migration clusters

exclusive.description: Whether the newly created cluster is exclusive to physical resources, when exclusive, a host will only deploy instances of the same cluster, which may result in poor resource utilization

region.description: The Region where the cluster is located

exclusive.description: Whether the newly created cluster is exclusive to physical resources, when exclusive, a host will only deploy instances of the same cluster, which may result in poor resource utilization

region.description: The Region where the cluster is located

copies.description: The number of copies of the newly created cluster data, consistent with the number of copies set in PD

dbUser.description: The username and password for the newly created database cluster, default is the root user, which is not valid for Data Migration clusters

exclusive.description: Whether the newly created cluster is exclusive to physical resources, when exclusive, a host will only deploy instances of the same cluster, which may result in poor resource utilization

status.description: Disk Status, 0 for available, 1 for inused

clusterType.description: What cluster is the host used for? [database/data migration]

cpuCores.description: Host cpu cores spec, init while importing

freeMemory.description: Unused memory size, Unit:GB, used for allocation

loadStat.description: Host Resource Stat, 0 for loadless, 1 for inused, 2 for exhaust

purpose.description: What Purpose is the host used for? [compute/storage/general]

reserved.description: Whether this host is reserved - will not be allocated

status.description: Host Status, 0 for Online, 1 for offline
